meanings.definition: A person who adds decorative details or features to something.
meanings.sent1: The talented embellishers transformed the plain dress into a stunning masterpiece.
meanings.sent2: The embellishers at the craft fair added sequins and beads to the handmade cards.
meanings.sent3: The embellishers at the party went overboard with glitter and feathers on the decorations.
meanings.sent4: The embellishers of the garden sprinkled colorful flowers like paint on a canvas.
meanings.sent5: The skilled embellishers turned the simple cake into a work of art with intricate designs.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to enhance or decorate something.
meanings.sent1: The artists used various embellishers to create unique textures on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The scrapbookers utilized decorative embellishers like stickers and ribbons.
meanings.sent3: The DIY enthusiasts found a new embellisher that made painting walls much easier.
meanings.sent4: The chef's secret embellisher for desserts was a sprinkle of edible gold dust.
meanings.sent5: The carpenter's favorite embellisher was a delicate carving tool for intricate designs.
